data.text: Chikuru itu un dhood Israel mondo uwinjie wende ywak ma asechuogonu:
“Israel ma en nyako ngili koro osepodho,
Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya,
Jehova Nyasaye wacho ni dhood Israel niya,
kik udhi Bethel,
Dwaruru Jehova Nyasaye eka unubed mangima,
Mano en wach manade ka uloko bura makare bedo lit,
Jehova Nyasaye ema nochweyo Yugni gi Ratego,
En ema oketho mier mochiel motegno
Un umon gi ngʼama odonjo ni jaketho,
Usethiro joma odhier
nikech aneno ka un kod ketho mangʼeny
Emomiyo ngʼat mariek lingʼ alingʼa e kinde ma kama
Dwaruru ber, to ok rach,
Beduru mamon gi timbe maricho, to heruru timbe mabeyo;
Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye, ma en Jehova Nyasaye Maratego wacho niya,
E puothe duto mag mzabibu ywak nobedie,
Yaye unune malit un joma gombo
Chiengʼno nochal mana gi ngʼat ma sibuor lawo,
Donge odiechiengno mar Jehova Nyasaye nobed odiechieng mudho mandiwa,
“Asin kendo amon gi sewni mutimona,
Kata obedo ni ukelona misengini miwangʼo pep kod misengini mag cham,
Weuru baro wiya gi wendeu mag pak,
Weuru mondo bura makare ema mondo omol ka pi aora,
“Yaye jo-Israel, bende ne ukelona misengini kata chiwo moro amora
Ne utingʼo kuonde lemo mag ruodhu malo,
omiyo abiro darou mi ateru e piny twech mabor mayombo Damaski,”
